user.title: Estrannaise HRT Monitor
user.description:
Set up estrogen level monitoring. Choose how to configure your dosing regimen.

Note: This integration provides pharmacokinetic APPROXIMATIONS of blood serum levels based on population models. Individual results may vary significantly. Always confirm with blood tests.

ester.title: Estradiol Ester
ester.description: Select the estradiol ester you use.

method.title: Dosing Method
method.description: Select how the estradiol will be administered.

auto_target.title: Target Range
auto_target.description: Choose the target estradiol range. The integration will auto-compute dose and interval to approximate this target.

confirm_schedules.title: Confirm Auto-Generated Schedules
confirm_schedules.description: The following {count} dosing schedules will be created for {ester} ({method}): {schedules}. Each schedule will appear as a separate entity that you can adjust individually.

regimen.title: Dosing Regimen
regimen.description: Configure your dosing schedule. Dose amount is in {dose_unit}.

data.enable_calendar: Add dose schedule to HA calendar
data.backfill_doses: Backfill past doses (enable if already on HRT)

guided_method.title: How Do You Take Estrogen?
guided_method.description: Select the form of estrogen you use.

guided_pill_dose.title: Pill Strength
guided_pill_dose.description: How many milligrams of estradiol is in each pill? This is usually printed on the pill or bottle label.

guided_pill_count.title: Number of Pills
guided_pill_count.description: How many pills do you take at a time?

guided_injection_ester.title: Injection Type
guided_injection_ester.description: What type of estradiol do you inject? This should be printed on your vial label.

guided_injection_strength.title: Vial Concentration
guided_injection_strength.description: What is the concentration of your vial? It should say on the label, e.g. '20 mg/mL'.

guided_injection_volume.title: Injection Volume
guided_injection_volume.description: How many mL do you inject each time?

guided_patch_strength.title: Patch Strength
guided_patch_strength.description: What is the delivery rate of your patch? This is printed on the patch box.

guided_patch_count.title: Number of Patches
guided_patch_count.description: How many patches do you wear at the same time?

guided_patch_schedule.title: Patch Schedule
guided_patch_schedule.description: How often do you change your patches?

guided_schedule.title: Dosing Frequency
guided_schedule.description: How often do you take your dose, in days? For example, every 5 days = 5.

guided_dose_time.title: Dose Time
guided_dose_time.description: What time of day do you usually dose? Use 24-hour format (HH:MM).

guided_days_until.title: Next Dose
guided_days_until.description: How many days from now until your next dose? Enter 0 if your next dose is today.

guided_backfill.title: Existing Schedule
guided_backfill.description: Have you already been {action} this schedule for a while? If yes, past doses will be backfilled so the chart shows a complete history.

error.invalid_combination: This ester/method combination is not available.
error.not_yet_supported: This combination is not yet supported.
error.oral_estradiol_only: Oral dosing is only available for micronized Estradiol, not esterified forms.

init.title: Estrannaise Options
init.description: Estimated levels are pharmacokinetic approximations, not actual blood serum measurements.

data.enable_calendar: Add dose schedule to HA calendar
data.backfill_doses: Backfill past doses (enable if already on HRT)
